variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: De-identified Subject ID

variable.name: lookup.race
variable.description: Race description

variable.name: race
variable.description: Race code

variable.name: gender
variable.description: Gender

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age at Consent

variable.name: qidsctotal.b
variable.description: QIDSC (Quick Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology) total score at Baseline

variable.name: hrsdtotal.b
variable.description: HRSD (Hamilton Rating Scale for Depression) total score at Baseline

variable.name: qidsctotal.w4
variable.description: QIDSC total score at Week 4

variable.name: remissionqids.w4
variable.description: QIDSC remission status at Week 4 (Remitter if QIDSCTotal_W4 < =5, Non Remitter if QIDSCTotal_W4 > 5)

variable.name: qidscpctchange.w4
variable.description: (([QIDSCTotal_W4]-[QIDSCTotal_B])/[QIDSCTotal_B]*100)

variable.name: qids.response2.w4
variable.description: Responder if QIDSCpctChange_W4 > = 50 , Non Responder if QIDSCpctChange_W4 < 50

variable.name: qidsctotal.w8
variable.description: QIDSC total score at Week8

variable.name: remissionqids.w8
variable.description: QIDSC remission status at Week 8 (Remitter if QIDSCTotal_W8 < =5, Non Remitter if QIDSCTotal_W8 > 5)

variable.name: qidscpctchange.w8
variable.description: (([QIDSCTotal_W8]-[QIDSCTotal_B])/[QIDSCTotal_B]*100)

variable.name: qids.response2.w8
variable.description: Responder if QIDSCpctChange_W8 >= 50 , Non Responder if QIDSCpctChange_W8 < 50

variable.name: med.b
variable.description: Medication at Baseline (citalopram/escitalopram)

variable.name: dose.b
variable.description: Dose of med.b drug prescribed at Baseline

variable.name: dose.w4
variable.description: Dose of drug (citalopram/escitalopram) subject is taking on their Week 4 visit

variable.name: dose.w8
variable.description: Dose of drug (citalopram/escitalopram) subject is taking on their Week 8 visit

variable.name: height
variable.description: Baseline Height

variable.name: weight
variable.description: Baseline Weight

variable.name: maritalstatus
variable.description: Marital status

variable.name: livewithspouse
variable.description: Indicator of whether subject lives with spouse

variable.name: yearsschool
variable.description: Total number of years completed

variable.name: highdegree
variable.description: Highest degree completed
variable.value: Doctorate or Professional Degree (e.g. MD, PhD, JD)

variable.name: currentstudent
variable.description: Is subject currently in school

variable.name: currentempstat
variable.description: Current employment status

variable.name: ageonset
variable.description: Age at onset of first major depressive episode

variable.name: seasonalpattern
variable.description: Is there a seasonal pattern to your depression

variable.name: psychotherapy
variable.description: Are you currently involved in psychotherapy

variable.name: remission
variable.description: Last visit remission defined as Remitter if last visit QIDS C <= 5, Non Remitter if last visit QIDSC > 5. If no W4 or W8 data then remission defined as Non Remitter.

variable.name: response
variable.description: Last-visit response defined as Responder if QIDSCpctChange >=50 , Non Responder if QIDSCpctChange < 50. If no W4 or W8 data then response defined as Non Responder

variable.name: qidscpctchange
variable.description: Difference between final visit QIDSC and baseline QIDSC, divided by baseline QIDSC and multiplied by 100. If no W4 or W8 data then change set to 0.

variable.name: IsExcluded
variable.description: Indicator of whether subject was excluded from GWAS

variable.name: ExclusionReason
variable.description: Non-Caucasian = Subject deemed non caucasian based on self-reported race and Structure Analyses Non-Compliant = Subject was deemed non compliant

variable.name: consentMonth
variable.description: Month subject consented to study

variable.name: consentYear
variable.description: Year subject consented to study

variable.name: currentonsetMonth
variable.description: Month of onset for current major depression episode

variable.name: currentonsetYear
variable.description: Year of onset for current major depression episode

variable.name: EVEC.1
variable.description: 1st eigenvector from principal components analysis used as a covariate in adjusted GWAS

variable.name: EVEC.2
variable.description: 2nd eigenvector from principal components analysis used as a covariate in adjusted GWAS

variable.name: EVEC.3
variable.description: 3rd eigenvector from principal components analysis used as a covariate in adjusted GWAS

variable.name: EVEC.4
variable.description: 4th eigenvector from principal components analysis used as a covariate in adjusted GWAS
